newest.message:
# Release v4.0.15
## Bug Fixes - Reduce spurious errors from querying corporation endpoints where the character does not have roles - Character LP list is now sorted descending by name - Notifications can now be closed by right clicking - Market order completed or expired notifications now appear again
## Contributors - Peter Han - hollo6 - corsair75 - wvdvegt

release.message:
# Release v4.0.16
## Bug Fixes - Assets ESI endpoint updated - Expired or completed market orders will be visible in most cases in the notification window - Reactions count calculates using the correct skill - Hotmail SMTP server updated for skill completed notifications
## Contributors - Peter Han - jamesemullican - poundjd - Wodin73 - hollo6
